text: Luke Newton (born 5 February 1997) is an English actor, known for his roles as Luke Attwood on the BBC drama The Cut and Ben Evans on the Disney Channel series The Lodge. In 2020, Newton is set to begin portraying the role of Colin Bridgerton on the Netflix'seriesBridgerton. ==Career== In 2010, Newton made his television debut in the BBC teen series The Cut as Luke Attwood, a role he portrayed for 11 episodes. In 2014, he appeared in two episodes of the BBC soap opera Doctors as Sam Hern. From 2016 to 2017, Newton starred in the Disney Channel series The Lodge as Ben Evans. While appearing on the series, he was also featured on the two accompanying soundtrack albums. In 2018, he starred in the Syfy television film Lake Placid: Legacy as Billy.
